ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "M2"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), "M2")), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"M1"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"M3"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"M3+"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"M3++") ) ) )
